downloadTitle: Visual Studio 64-bit Hosted Visual C++ Tools 2005 Service Pack 1 ATL Security Update
downloadDescription: A security issue has been identified that could allow an attacker to compromise your Windows-based system with Visual Studio 64-bit Hosted Visual C++ Tools 2005 Service Pack 1.
detailsSection: A security issue has been identified that could allow an attacker to compromise your Windows-based system with Visual Studio 64-bit Hosted Visual C++ Tools 2005 Service Pack 1 and gain complete control over it. You can help protect your computer by installing this update from Microsoft.
installInstructionSection:
1. Click the Download button on this page to start the download, or select a different language from the Change language drop-down list and click Change.
  2. Do one of the following:
    • To start the installation immediately, click Run.
    • To save the download to your computer for installation at a later time, click Save.
    • To cancel the installation, click Cancel.
additionalInformationSection: Please see the Knowledge Base Articles KB973830 for more information.
